# What is this?

 This is an analysis of the GB Driving License Data. This data set is provided as a snapshot of the current DVLA database at a set point of time. These snapshots are provided quarterly. 
 
## Analysis
[See the notebook here](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/ConnorKirk/DriverLicenseData/blob/master/Analysis.nb.html)

## Data

Data taken from [GB Driving License Data](https://data.gov.uk/dataset/driving-licence-data)
